Country: EUROPEAN_COUNTRY
City: EUROPEAN_COUNTRY_CITY
Address: ADDRESS WITH, NUMBER
Location: STADIUM, PLACE, HOTEL, ETC
Start Date: YYYY-MM-DD
End Date: Type: YYYY-MM-DD
KIND: PHYSICAL/ONLINE/HYBRID - Pick One
